entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Creating a dotnet tool with multiple executables #27459
  • [NetSDKE2E][Loc]With .NET 7 rc1 installed, the texts in CLI are partly unlocalzied after running "dotnet workload search". #27447
  • "CreateAppHost" task failed unexpectedly (MacOS) - Could not set file permission 493 #27436

Closed

  • Icon for dotnet-CLI #24578
  • [ApiCompat] Add a feature flag to enable the AttributeMustMatch rule #27453

PullRequests

Created

  • Add test for framework trimming warnings #27461
    Area-ILLink
  • Added `new` to the list of commands to track the second verb #27457
    area: dotnet new
  • Moved the options to new \ new create level #27455
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1967771 #27439
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'main' #27438
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Add test for trimming warnings in 5.0 app #27460
    Area-ILLink
  • Update dotnet tool update description. #27458
    Area-Tools
  • Move 7.0.1xx (sans eng/common) to -Svc build pools #27426
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Build 7.0.1xx branches internally #27465
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add EnableRuleAttributesMustMatch switch #27454
    Area-ApiCompat
  • ApiCompat/AttributesMustMatch: add test case for attributes with array and type arguments #27431
    Area-ApiCompat
  • Move non-eng-common builds to NetCore1ESPool-Svc-* version #27425
    Area-Infrastructure
  • dotnet new tests refactoring #27333
    area: dotnet new

Updated

  • emit diagnostic for adding sealed to interface member #27421
    Area-ApiCompat
  • Removing default ProduceReferenceAssembly value for F# #26306
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update AO test #27334
    Area-ILLink
  • Add error when failing to resolve SDK with workload sdk resolver #27432
  • Ensure case-insensitive web.config file name is used #14854
    Area-WebSDK, 7.0.1xx
